channel.title: [317] Flamed Fury **Done!** [317] New FunPK Area! Working report system!
channel.description:
Server = 100% Done ||||||||||||||||||| Server is on the download page! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,374914.0.html
This is my first server source I actually put some effort in to! Don't tell me I suck cuz I'm a newb coder! I will be adding more! I'm probably just off of the computer cuz I've been on too long today! Otherwise I'm just not on for some reason!
[size=24pt]~YOU MUST READ THIS~[/size] When I put this up for dl and you leech me, GIVE ME CREDITS! And also when you dl there's a folder called "Other" and it has 4 documents. 1. Silab Item Codes 2. A README.txt document so [size=24pt][b]READ[/b][/size] that! I know, I know, you're probably thinking 'I hate reading!' but just spare a minute of your time to read it. 3. A Updates documents 4. A Coordinates document
~ Credits ~ Me Zykev2 Hidden Pker `Rich o.O O.o
Things To Do/Things I might do! ? = Things I might do ! = Things To Do
Add a lottery? Make ::commands interface? Make GSMini? Add summoning?
Make new skill area!
[size=16pt]~~FEATURES!~~[/size] Changed staff area Relocated the JAD Fixed NPC Drops! Working Report System! More NPCs added to train! New FunPK Area! New Home area New starting outfit Starter has been changed New Thieve area New Smithing/Mining area Another new mining area!
(More pics coming soon!) Pics Below:
Starter! Gives all ur lvls 50k XP! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic15.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic16.jpg[/img]
New Home! Coded 100% by me! :) [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic1.jpg[/img]
New train! Will be adding more NPCs soon! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic2.jpg[/img]
Vengeance [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic3.jpg[/img]
Team PK area! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic4.jpg[/img]
1v1 PK area! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic5.jpg[/img]
WC Area! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic6.jpg[/img]
Slayer! (If you were wondering, I took a pic away from the NPCs so they're all still there btw!) [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic7.jpg[/img]
New thieve area! Coded 100% by me! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic8.jpg[/img]
Shops! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic9.jpg[/img]
Dark Bow Mini-Game! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic10.jpg[/img]
New Smithing/Mining Area! Coded 100% by ME! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic11.jpg[/img]
Fishing Area! Fixed Wildy Zone! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic12.jpg[/img]
New Mining Area! Fixed Wildy Zone! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic13.jpg[/img]
Fully working FunPK! Coded 100% by me! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic17.jpg[/img]
Working report system! Shows who reported who in runserver! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic18.jpg[/img]
New staff area! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic20.jpg[/img]
Jad has been relocated so you don't get lagged! Watch out! He auto attacks you! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic19.jpg[/img]
Bye! Feel free to rep! [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/serverpic14.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=374261.msg2822632#msg2822632 date=1244724169]

Dont forget to get a moderator approval. PM a mod, or use the IRC chat to get an approval.

You only need approval for a development thread.

@Topic: This section isn’t for minor developments, such as spawning NPC’s, changing teleports, etc.

He could move on to bigger things once the little things are done. Don’t jump to enclutions.[/quote]
I think you mean conclusions. And no, the developments from most of the members on MoparScape are very minor; they don’t have the ability to move onto greater matters.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Server = 100% Done ||||||||||||||||||| Server is on the download page! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,374914.0.html

This is my first server source I actually put some effort in to! Don’t tell me I suck cuz I’m a newb coder!
I will be adding more! I’m probably just off of the computer cuz I’ve been on too long today! Otherwise I’m just not on for some reason!

[size=24pt]~YOU MUST READ THIS~[/size]
When I put this up for dl and you leech me, GIVE ME CREDITS! And also when you dl there’s a folder called “Other” and it has 4 documents.

  1. Silab Item Codes
  2. A README.txt document so [size=24pt]READ[/size] that! I know, I know, you’re probably thinking ‘I hate reading!’ but just spare a minute of your time to read it.
  3. A Updates documents
  4. A Coordinates document

~ Credits ~
Me
Zykev2
Hidden Pker
`Rich
o.O O.o

Things To Do/Things I might do!
? = Things I might do
! = Things To Do

Add a lottery?
Make ::commands interface?
Make GSMini?
Add summoning?

Make new skill area!

[size=16pt]FEATURES![/size]
Changed staff area
Relocated the JAD
Fixed NPC Drops!
Working Report System!
More NPCs added to train!
New FunPK Area!
New Home area
New starting outfit
Starter has been changed
New Thieve area
New Smithing/Mining area
Another new mining area!

(More pics coming soon!) Pics Below:

Starter! Gives all ur lvls 50k XP!

New Home! Coded 100% by me!

New train! Will be adding more NPCs soon!

Vengeance

Team PK area!

1v1 PK area!

WC Area!

Slayer! (If you were wondering, I took a pic away from the NPCs so they’re all still there btw!)

New thieve area! Coded 100% by me!

Shops!

Dark Bow Mini-Game!

New Smithing/Mining Area! Coded 100% by ME!

Fishing Area! Fixed Wildy Zone!

New Mining Area! Fixed Wildy Zone!

Fully working FunPK! Coded 100% by me!

Working report system! Shows who reported who in runserver!

New staff area!

Jad has been relocated so you don’t get lagged! Watch out! He auto attacks you!

Bye! Feel free to rep!

Read full topic
